ios.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/SafarWay.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme Stage -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/SafarWay.xcworkspace -scheme Prod -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

ios.sim.stage.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/SafarWay.xcworkspace  -scheme Stage -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

ios.sim.stage.ci.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/SafarWay.xcworkspace -scheme Stage -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

ios.sim.dev.ci.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/SafarWay.xcworkspace -scheme Dev -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

ios.sim.prod.ci.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/SafarWay.xcworkspace -scheme Prod -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

android.emu.debug.build: cd android && ENVFILE=../.env.dev ./gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..

android.emu.release.build: cd android && ENVFILE=../.env.production ./gradlew app:assembleReleaseE2E assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release && cd ..
